abilities.name: HEAL
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown H, Unown E, Unown A, and Unown L on your Bench, you may remove all Special Conditions from 1 of your Active Pok√©mon.

attacks.name: Hidden Power
